content: After booking your ticket on Rakuten Travel Experiences, an e-ticket will be sent to your registered e-mail address. You will receive two e-mails â€” one is your reservation confirmation e-mail and the other is your e-ticket.

When you arrive at the facility, please visit the entrance counter and click on the Voucher link in the e-mail sent to you at the time of purchase. Please click the Use button and show the screen to the staff. (Please ensure that your smartphone can connect to the internet before your visit)
Enter the Kyoto Takenosato Onsen Manyo-no-Yu!
